_aChangeLog.text: Music is now controlled by the Music Volume slider in the Audio Options.
The 7 second trap is now 8 seconds.
Replaced the random doors with a different trap.
The first two holes at the low gravity fall are a little bigger, and the last block before it is also bigger.
Changed the teleport method used at the longjumps.
Reduced the lag at the wind part.

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Thanks to everyone who pointed things out that needed fixing or changes.

_sText:
mgpharaohstomb_fix
==================
- This is a _course_ map which I've been working on for quite a while, and I'm finally going to go ahead and release it. I'd consider this map hard for _some_ people.
- Some traps were inspired by other mappers, _all_ of which were credited accordingly.
- This map is intended for _66 tick_ servers. (For those that still use 100+..)
- Obviously, a **Noblock** plugin is required..
-  Map allows respawn **_for the first ten minutes_**.
  -  Map supports the [AutoRespawn](http://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?p=905786 "AutoRespawn") plugin for that duration. (I _highly_ suggest you use it.)
     - **For the servers that do not choose to use it, when you die, join spectate and then join the Terrorist team again.**
  - I also suggest you use a dissolve plugin, one such as this: [Dissolve](http://forums.alliedmods.net/showthread.php?t=71084 "Dissolve").
- **Thank you for downloading and playing!**
- **If there are any problems, please let me know.**

_fix Changes
==================

- The screenshots have not been updated as there were very little to no visual changes at the points at which I took the original screenshots. 
 - Music is now controlled by the Music Volume slider in the Audio Options.
 - The map is overall _a tiny bit_ easier.
     - The 7 second trap is now 8 seconds.
     - Replaced the random doors with a different trap.
     - The first two holes at the low gravity fall are a little bigger, and the last block before it is also bigger.
 - Changed the teleport method used at the longjumps. (To fix a flaw.)
 - Reduced the lag at the wind part.
 - Other small fixes and changes..
